Title: Worlding
Goal: Not to show you a place, if not making you discover it.
SignUpButton: Get your first route for free
BottomSection: Try Worlding and feel the difference.
AcceptForm: Please, accept conditions to sign up.

Whatpage.Title: What's
Whatpage.ConceptSubtitle: Explore and discover on your own way
Whatpage.ConceptExploreDescription: We create routes connecting the most important places in the cities. The routes show you the nex point, but you decide the way making you explore and discover the city between the points.
Whatpage.ConceptWayDescription: You decide your way, streets where your walk, places, where you stop, time when you start, etc.
Whatpage.ProjectSubtitle: Integrate the world, explore and discover around it
Whatpage.ProjectInvestigateDescription: We work finding the best points, good description, histories and curiosities, to create routes.
Whatpage.ProjectCreateDescription: Where everyone find routes, a new places to discover, get experiences and enjoy.
Whatpage.ProjectDesignDescription: We work hardly to design and develop a perfect application to transmit our essence.

Whypage.Title: Why use
Whypage.ConceptSubtitle: Sign up to get for free your first route and ...
Whypage.ConceptInfoTitle: Infomation about the city or place
Whypage.ConceptInfoDescription: Places around, tips, public transport, local expressions, etc.
Whypage.ConceptStartTitle: Start the route, whenever you want
Whypage.ConceptMakeTitle: Decide how to make the route
Whypage.ConceptBeautifulDescription: Take all the photos you want.
Whypage.ConceptBreakDescription: Pause the route, have a coffee, a beer or have lunch and then continue.
Whypage.ConceptAwesomeDescription: Stay alltime you want. Remember: You aren't in a group!
Whypage.ConceptFinishDescription: Comment and give for opinion. Share on:

Wherepage.Title: Where's
Wherepage.ConceptSubtitle: We are working to integrate every place in the world
Wherepage.ConceptInfoTitle: Are you looking for a city or a place, that isn't integrate? Contact with us!

Colaboratepage.Title: Do you want to contribute with
Colaboratepage.DonationSubtitle: Make a route and thank us with a donation
Colaboratepage.DonationInfoIntegrate: Integrate new ciites, new places, new languages, new functions, new ideas.
Colaboratepage.DonationInfoHire: Hire good proffesionals with good skills to create a great plataform, and offer them the best conditions and good working places.
Colaboratepage.DonationInfoGet: Get our goals and innovate to create a new ways to know places.
Colaboratepage.CareerTitle: Dreaming to work in a startup?
Colaboratepage.CareerSubtitle: We need roles with differente skills
Colaboratepage.CareerBusinessDescription: Experiences in startup projects? Scheduling, prioritizing tasks and deliveries? Creating and managing teams? Have your got analytics skills?
Colaboratepage.CareerTechnicalDescription: Have you got programming knowledge? Angular, Node.js, Pyhton? Android and iOs apps development? Do you like to work with data and databases?
Colaboratepage.CareerCreativeDescription: Are you a good designer? Do you love to create good user experiences and app interfaces? Use Photoshop, Illustration, Premiere, Sketch?
Colaboratepage.CareerMarketingDescription: Have your created marketing campaigns? Users profiles? Ads? Do you like social media?
Colaboratepage.CareerContact: If you are interesting on working or colaborate with us contact by

Cookiepage.Text: Hi there, we use cookies to offer you a better browsing experience and to analyze site traffic. By continuing to use our website, you consent to the use of these cookies.
